content:
MK-1492
May 11, 1962
Mr. W. K. Ku Chief Engineer Shihmen Development Commission Shihifen Camp Taiwan
Subject: GSA Surplus Equipment Lorraine Truck Crane
Dear Mr. Ku:
Our letter MK-1413 dated March 10, 1962 indicated additional truck crane of 15 to 35 ton capacity was required for the project.
We have been verbally advised that one 20 ton truck crane is now at the BES yard in Taipei and could be made avail- able to the Shihmen Project.
We recommend that this equipment be acquired.
Very truly yours, MORRISON KNUDSEN OF ASIA, ING.
Slevy Je human Glenn C. Johnson Project Manager
c.c. Dam Construction Dept. Mr. J. B. Carter, AID/T
GCJ/mh
Aendemia Historica
355
